briefTitle: Genetic Expression and Prediction of Response to Neoadjuvant Docetaxel or Doxorubicin in Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Patterns of Genetic Expression Associated to Sensibility to Doxorubicin Versus Docetaxel as Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy for Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: correlation of genetic tumoral pattern with response to docetaxel versus doxorubicin
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Locally advanced, inoperable breast carcinoma or stage II not amenable to breast preserving surgery (amendment introduced on november 2006)
* Signed informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Age \>75
* Cardiac disease; LEFT \<50%
* Hyperbilirubinemia
